appDescription: Your gateway to a vast collection of millions of movies 🎬 and TV shows 📺, all available for free! 😜
greeting: We have prepared new collection of movies 🎬 and tv shows 📺 for you 💃🕺😅
tvShowHint: Go to the tv show page
logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
deleteAccountConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will permanently erase all your data.
youAreNotConnectedMessage: You must be connected to access this page. If you think this message is wrong, please contact us.
firstNameErrorMessageTooShort: Your first name is too short 🤔
firstNameErrorMessageTooLong: Your first name is too long 😱
firstNameErrorMessagePatternMismatch: Please enter a valid first name 😅
lastNameErrorMessageTooShort: Your last name is too short 🤔
lastNameErrorMessageTooLong: Your last name is too long 😱
lastNameErrorMessagePatternMismatch: Please enter a valid last name 😅
deleteMovieMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this movie from your favorites?
deleteSeriesMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this series from your favorites?
failedToAddMovieToFavs: Failed to add movie to favorites
failedToAddSeriesToFavs: Failed to add series to favorites
failedToRemoveMovieFromFavs: Failed to remove movie from favorites
failedToRemoveSeriesFromFavs: Failed to remove series from favorites
failedToAddMovieToYourFavs: Failed to add movie to your favorites
failedToRemoveMovieFromYourFavs: Failed to remove movie from your favorites
failedToAddSeriesToYourFavs: Failed to add series to your favorites
failedToRemoveSeriesFromYourFavs: Failed to remove series from your favorites
noFavMoviesMessage: You have no favorite movies yet. Start adding some movies to your list by clicking the explore movies button below
noFavSeriesMessage: You have no favorite series yet. Start adding some series to your list by clicking the explore movies button below
welcomeDescription: 💫 Your gateway to a vast collection of millions of movies 🎬 and TV shows 📺, all available for free! Prepare to immerse yourself in a boundless universe 🪐 of entertainment, where you can explore and enjoy an extensive library of captivating content. 🤩
discoverDescriptionX: 🚀 Embark on an exhilarating journey of discovery 🔦 with %s! Unearth hidden gems 💎, find the latest blockbusters 🎉, and uncover your next binge-worthy obsession.🕵🥰
accountDescriptionX: 🔐 In less than 60 seconds, you can open your own secure and always-free %s account, using an email, a username of your choice, your first and last names, and a password. ✅
favoriteDescriptionX: 🎨 Unlock the power of personalization with %s! As a member, you have the ability to add a movie or TV show you like to your favorites list 🌟, ensuring that your most cherished titles are just a click away. 💖
conversationDescriptionX: 💬 Engage with %s's vibrant community! Dive into the world of movie and TV show discussions as you leave your thoughts and read insightful comments from fellow enthusiasts. 🎙
languageDescription: 🤟 This Web App has currently been translated into 4 different languages (i.e. English, French, Russian and Spanish). Feel free to switch between languages anytime from the settings page. 📡
themeDescriptionXYZ: Don't like how it looks? With 3 themes to choose from (%s for crazy people, %s for geniuses, and %s for simple folks), you'll never get bored. And, your eyes will thank you :) 🤓
noMovieCommentLeaveOne: There's no comment for this movie yet. Be the first to leave one!
noSeriesCommentLeaveOne: There's no comment for this series yet. Be the first to leave one!
noTVShowCommentLeaveOne: There's no comment for this tv show yet. Be the first to leave one!
